description: Become an agent of change now!
title: How do I become a U-Reporter?
content:
Would you like to have your voice heard?

It is very easy to become a U-Reporter and takes less than one minute. Click here to become a U-Reporter.

Also, you can send us a message directly via to U-Report Global in Facebook, and text JOIN through Facebook messenger.

1) Access the U-Report Global page in Facebook: [https://free.facebook.com/ureportglobal/][1]

2) Send us a message to U-Report global in Facebook and text JOIN through Facebook messenger.

If you have a smartphone you can also join U-Report by downloading the U-Report Android Application by following this link : [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.ureport][2] (data charges may apply)

Try to download the application with a WIFI network if you have access to one!

Next article :


  [1]: https://free.facebook.com/ureportglobal/
  [2]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.ureport
